metadata.title: CVE-2024-39492 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mailbox: mtk-cmdq: Fix pm_runtime_get_sync() warning in mbox shutdownThe return value of pm_runtime_get_sync() in cmdq_mbox_shutdown()will return 1 when pm runtime state is active, and we don't want toget the warning message in this case.So we change the return value < 0 for WARN_ON().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
